text: Futhi ngosuku lapho eyobaqoqela ndawonye bonke (bese ethi kubona) Oh Nina sixuku samaJinn! (Nadukisa) abantu abaningi futhi abasizi babo phakathi kwabantu bayothi, “Nkosi yethu abanye bethu bazuza ngabanye futhi sesifinyelele esikhathini sethu okuyisona owasinqumela sona”, iyothi “umlilo yindawo yenu yokuhlala khona ingunaphakade” ngaphandle uma uMvelinqangi ethanda ngempela iNkosi yakho inobuhlakani iyazi
